page.title: 14GARB. VILLAGE HALL (USERS)
page.content: {GROUP MEETINGS Women's Institute. Monthly. Over 60's. Monthly. Brownies. Weekly. Cubs. Weekly. Mothers, Babies & toddlers. Weekly. Youth Club. Weekly. Badminton.(Day) Twice weekly. Badminton.(Evening) Twice weekly. Carpet bowls. Weekly. Keep Fit. Weekly. Dance. Six weekly. Norwich Health Authority. {(CHILD CLINIC) } Quarterly. Auctions. Two monthly. Plus fund raising, school, and sundry private bookings. The N.H.R. does not use the hall but holds meetings at members homes. A play group plans to start in January and there are plans for a drama group.
